description: H W Baldwin on July as crucial month
title: July Is Critical Period for Allies, Axis; Shifts of Germans Following the Fall of Sevastopol And the Battle in Egypt Will Decide the Course of War
title_page: July Is Critical Period for Allies, Axis; Shifts of Germans Following the Fall of Sevastopol And the Battle in Egypt Will Decide the Course of War - The New York Times

About the Archive
